ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Levitate
ygData.msgSnippet: Watcht he Shammie guild in Ogguk,  I am kindly in the rest of Ogguk but the Shamans still KOS to me.  They are on some goofy faction, unlike the rest of the
ygData.messageBody:
Watcht he Shammie guild in Ogguk, I am kindly in the rest of Ogguk but
the Shamans still KOS to me. They are on some goofy faction, unlike the
rest of the ogres. (fortunately thtey seem to start with a slow
vcasting root spell so I was able to run quite a ways away before the
spell hit, and I got beat to a pulp. So I could retrieve the corpse
without reagrroing the ogre.

/Todd A. Mudek
nosferatu@...


-----Original Message-----
From: Paul Jesernig [mailto:pwjesernig@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2001 11:00 AM
To: eqenchanters@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Levitate

Shaman guilds are in Oggok, Grobb, Cabilis, and Halas. All will have
levitate. The druid guilds in Rivervale and Kelethin also have the spell
for
sale.

Lozi ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
